fixed_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 57.7/59.7/61.7% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 16% for foes with an elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Mafrei

innate_skill.desc: Restores 1.9% of max HP at the start of each turn.
innate_skill.name: Regenerate I

innate_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 114.8/118.7/122.6% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 16% for foes with an elemental ailment.
innate_skill.name: Frei

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 7%. When using Nuclear skills on all foes, increase Attack by 27%.
passive_skill.name: Southern Sunlight

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 7%. When using Nuclear skills on all foes, increase Attack by 31%.
passive_skill.name: Southern Sunlight I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
